verbs.description: anthony [V: anenih] [ARG1: a personal and political portrait] [ARG0: by reuben abati anenih] came into solid prominence during the president obasanjo years he was a power broker in obasanjo government his name may not have been known outside nigeria but at home he represented the true and complete incarnation of the politician as a man of action president olusegun obasanjo chief tayo akpata goodluck jonathan superintendent robert bowers egypt ken saro wiwa israel united states anthony enahoro chairman of the npn president goodluck jonathan olusegun obasanjo presidential campaign organization nigerian government hitler yakon group of companies national party of nigeria granada babangida president jonathan pdp board of trustees anenih peoples democratic party ibrahim babangida chairman south south nigeria commissioner squirrel hill sdp president donald trump pittsburgh president shehu shagari nigeria police donald trump assault samuel ogbemudia asokoro papa anenih president reuben abati bendel state shehu shagari anthony anenih anthony akhakhon anenih pennsylvania official sahara reporters social democratic party adams oshiomhole m k o abiola olusegun obasanjo
